page.title: 09LEISURE - ADULTS
page.content: Our parents too make good use of the {local amenities}for their enter- tainment. A lot of people are involved in church activities or spend a lot of time at the{Community Centre}where there is a lounge and a bar where they can meet and have a chat and a drink. Sometimes they play{badminton}and the team takes part in the local{ {Warrington League.}Other activities include{bingo, indoor bowls}or{old {time dancing. The{village pubs}are also quite pleasant and most have tables outside where people can sit out on nice summer evenings. The area is surrounded by natural countryside and also new{Country Parks developed alongside the old{Sankey {Navigation}and is frequently used for walks and leisure activities.
